name: cbvraldva
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s1, c0, w2)))

stmt.origin: cbvraldva2(s0, s1, c0, c0, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: cbvraldva2(s0, s1, c0, c0, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s1, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, c0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s1, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, c0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s1, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Rule used to change the bound variable in a restricted universal quantifier with implicit substitution. Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
